title: Magnus 1: Robot Fighter (Magnus, Robot Fighter)
description: Magnus, Robot Fighter, Volume 1 is an original full-color graphic novel "reboot" of the famous comic book character! Featuring redesign and cover art by legendary artist Steranko and script by Death of Superman writer Louise Simonson, this volume offers an exciting adventure. Magnus helps Earth destroy the invading alien cyborgs known as Traffickers, who deal in human flesh for both food and replacement body parts, by sacrificing himself in an explosion that destroys the aliens' mastership as well.
author: Louise Simonson
